description: Made from slub cotton jersey. Yarn-dyed with true indigo and discharge-printed with a geometric motif. Fabric is washed down to achieve more depth. Metal concho button at the neck. Western-style front and back yokes.
fitting_details: Size medium has a 29" back body length, an 18.25" shoulder, and a 43.5" chest.
Point collar with a metal concho button at the front. Snapped placket. Western-style front and back yokes.
Dyed with true indigo, which may rub off onto fabrics, leather, and upholstery.
